headline: TIGIT Inhibitors Drugs Clinical Trials & Global Market Opportunity Report 2026-2030: Roche, Gilead Sciences, Merck, Arcus Biosciences, Compugen, and Vir Biotechnology Advance Deep Oncology Pipelines
summary: The TIGIT inhibitors market is poised for growth with the anticipated drug approval by 2030, over 40 drugs in clinical trials, and a dynamic landscape involving major pharmaceutical and biotech firms. headline: BioInvent–KEYTRUDA Ovarian Cancer Signal Could Be A Game Changer For Merck (MRK)
summary: BioInvent International has reported encouraging interim Phase 2a results showing that combining its BI-1808 antibody with Merck’s KEYTRUDA improved response rates and maintained a favorable safety profile in patients with recurrent ovarian cancer. This early efficacy signal in a difficult-to-treat cancer adds another potential use case for KEYTRUDA, underscoring the importance of Merck’s immuno-oncology collaborations. Next, we’ll examine how this early ovarian cancer data for the...
